commits.author: Uwe Schindler
commits.sourceNew: /** Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if none * is found, reads the term values in field * and returns a {@link DocTerms} instance, providing a * method to retrieve the term (as a BytesRef) per document. * @param reader Used to get field values. * @param field Which field contains the strings. * @return The values in the given field for each document. * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public DocTermsIndex getTermsIndex (AtomicIndexReader reader, String field) throws IOException;
commits.sourceOld: /** Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if none * is found, reads the term values in field * and returns a {@link DocTerms} instance, providing a * method to retrieve the term (as a BytesRef) per document. * @param reader Used to get field values. * @param field Which field contains the strings. * @return The values in the given field for each document. * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public DocTermsIndex getTermsIndex (IndexReader reader, String field) throws IOException;

commits.author: Uwe Schindler
commits.sourceOld: /** Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if none * is found, reads the term values in field * and returns a {@link DocTerms} instance, providing a * method to retrieve the term (as a BytesRef) per document. * @param reader Used to get field values. * @param field Which field contains the strings. * @return The values in the given field for each document. * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public DocTermsIndex getTermsIndex (AtomicIndexReader reader, String field) throws IOException;
